item.title: PD Stock Sank To An All-Time Low Today – What’s Driving The Slump?
item.description: PagerDuty stock plummeted nearly 24% after brokerages slashed the stock’s target price after the company trimmed its FY2026 topline outlook.

item.title: Why Did AMBR Stock Surge Over 61% Today?
item.description: Amber announced a $50 million share buyback program and also posted strong third-quarter results.

item.title: Why Did SMX Stock Surge Over 40% Today?
item.description: SMX showcased its patented molecular-marking technology at the DMCC Precious Metals Conference in Dubai.

item.title: Tether’s USDT Downgraded To ‘Weak’ By S&P After Bitcoin Stores Exceed Reserve Cushion
item.description: S&P Global said the quality of USDT’s reserves has deteriorated over the past year.
